description: Angel Allwood is looking to get away from it all by relaxing for the weekend at a MILF retreat. She's pampered with pedicures and champagne all day. Two of the spa workers are fed up with waiting on her hand and foot and sneak into her room at night to bang the shit out of her whether she wants it or not! They make sure she goes back home to her husband and kids in tip top shape. Finger banging, spanking, ass worship, pussy licking and strap-on anal sex all included.
title: Lesbian MILF Retreat
